article:
Formatting specifications for UBL Order Change instances
2004OASIS $Date: 2005-05-27 22:23:27 $(UTC)
Purchase order change formatting specifications
Two sample formatting specifications are offered for this document type:
Office-oriented order change form
United Nations Layout Key form 230: Order Change
For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.
&FS-status;
